casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Anthony C. MANOUSOS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

Stephan E. Seeger, Stamford, in support of the petition.

Linda F. Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 310, 178 A.3d 1087 (2018), is denied.
